integration_patterns: Data integration with various EHR systems

evidence.claim: PerformLine utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure solutions.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations ensuring health data privacy.
Integration capabilities includes support for HL7 FHIR standards.
PerformLine's data processing architecture involves AWS Kinesis for real-time data streaming.
The platform integrates with EHR systems thus compliant with health standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or EDI services found on site.
